export var isEmpty=function isEmpty(value){if(!value)return true;return false;};export var isEmail=function isEmail(email){// eslint-disable-next-line
var re=/^(([^<>()[\]\\.,;:\s@\"]+(\.[^<>()[\]\\.,;:\s@\"]+)*)|(\".+\"))@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\])|(([a-zA-Z\-0-9]+\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}))$/;return re.test(email);};export var isLength=function isLength(password){if(password.length<6)return true;return false;};export var isMatch=function isMatch(password,cf_password){if(password===cf_password)return true;return false;};
